dialogues.text: The Aemir river is a very ancient river that has provided Celewynn with fresh water for centuries.
The soil beneath the pond absorbs the water and magically transports it back to the river origin, creating an infinite flow of water.
You may make offerings to the pond and it will reward you with a temporary boost in your fishing skill.

options.text: Where does the water from the Aemir pond go?
Have you witnessed anything unusual lately?

dialogues.text: Oh... I don't want to get in trouble.. I... I shouldn't, I can't.

options.text: It's okay, I'm here to help. Don't worry.
Tell me or you will be in much more trouble!

dialogues.text: O-oh.. Okay... Well, for a few weeks now, I've noticed someone sneaking around town using the scaffolds and headed towards the Aemir Riverflank.
I bumped into him once by accident, and he signed at me to be quiet about it. Something about his aura seemed very threatening...
I did not dare speak up, I was afraid he might have hurt me if I told anyone. Though, he has not returned from his last venture into the mountains.

options.text: Thank you for telling me. I am going to take care of this.

dialogues.text: Brave traveler! Thank you and Terra be with you!
